content: Yes, QuickBooks has a mobile app that you can download on your smartphone. With the QuickBooks mobile app, you can track your cash flow, create and send invoices, view customer information, and manage your expenses on the go. The app is available for both iOS and Android devices, and it's synced with your QuickBooks account, which means any updates you make on the app will be reflected in the desktop version of QuickBooks. This makes it easy for small business owners to stay on top of their cash flow management, even when they're not at their desk.
